thread.title: Chicago Recording Artist Jon Writer Releases New Music Video "Lose Your Mind"
thread.title_full: Chicago Recording Artist Jon Writer Releases New Music Video "Lose Your Mind" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chicago Recording Artist Jon Writer Releases New Music Video "Lose Your Mind"
text:
Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes announces the release of newest music video by Jon Writer currently seeking blog placements and interviews.
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Today Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes announces the release of "Lose Your Mind", the latest music video by Chicago's Jon Writer featuring Sneezy Music. The video can be viewed in its entirety at the Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes website .
Jon Writer is currently seeking press opportunities, interviews, features, and more. He can be reached through his official website .
About Jon Writer: If you’re looking for a once-in-a-lifetime artist, look no further; Jon Writer is an American Rapper from Chicago, IL that always seeks to capitalize and expand his brand! With an ever-growing fanbase, he currently has break-through songs in “Like Me” and “Lose Your Mind” that are receiving radio play nationwide! His debut album Race Against Time is now available on iTunes, Spotify, Xbox Live, PS Network, Beats Music, F.Y.E. CD retail stores nationwide, and Pandora Radio!
His music has even inspired a newly released film, titled “What I Want”, which was released on 12-19-14; needless to say, he is catching a massive buzz fast! For more info on Jon Writer visit his official Facebook fan page .
About Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes:
Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes are the most widely distributed mixtapes in the world, with over 100 million downloads/plays generated by over 300 volumes officially hosted by major artists. Coast 2 Coast has a solid reach in the new music industry with a digital magazine, DJ coalition, industry tips blog, yearly convention, and more. Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes represents a unique opportunity for artists of all urban genres, from major to indie. For more information, visit http://www.coast2coastmixtapes.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb12998290.htm
